TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingProfile extends System.Object

summary.span: 建立 之中工作流程追蹤記錄的訂閱。

span.span: Creates a subscription to workflow tracking records in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤設定檔中定義的查詢會定義訂閱所傳回的事件類型。The queries defined within the tracking profile define the kinds of events that are returned by the subscription.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Activities::Tracking::ImplementationVisibility ImplementationVisibility { System::Activities::Tracking::ImplementationVisibility get(); void set(System::Activities::Tracking::ImplementationVisibility value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會篩選從最上層活動 (組成其他活動實作的活動) 的巢狀活動中發出的追蹤記錄。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that filters tracking records emitted from nested activities within a top level activity (activities that compose the implementation of another activity.)

value.span: 物件，指出需篩選的記錄範圍。

span.span: An object that indicates the scope of records to be filtered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤記錄可使用追蹤設定檔中的兩個可視性模式加以篩選。Tracking records can be filtered using two visibility modes within a tracking profile. 可視性模式會指定工作流程中所追蹤的活動。The visibility mode specifies the activities being tracked within the workflow. 追蹤設定檔中 implementationVisibility 設定所指定的可視性模式包括：The visibility modes specified by the implementationVisibility setting in the tracking profile are: - - 這個設定會套用於複合活動 (包含其實作中其他的活動) 的追蹤記錄篩選。This setting applies to the filtering of tracking records for composite activities (activities that contain other activities within its implementation.) 如果**implementationVisibility**是**RootScope**和複合活動不是工作流程的根活動中，只有複合活動內的最上層活動追蹤。If **implementationVisibility** is **RootScope** and the composite activity is not the root activity for the workflow, only the top level activity within the composite activity is tracked. 當設定為**RootScope**，這個旗標會隱藏，不會顯示從工作流程的根活動的追蹤記錄。When set to **RootScope**, this flag suppresses the tracking records for activities that are not visible from the root of the workflow. 只有根活動及其實作會受到追蹤。Only the root activity and its implementation are tracked. 如果實作包含屬於複合活動的活動，則只有複合活動或受到追蹤，其實作則不會。If the implementation contains activities that are composite activities, then the composite activity is tracked but not its implementation. 比方說，若複合活動，裡面會實作為"MyActivity"與"Activity1"和"Activity2"，其中包含實作並**implementationVisibility**設定為**RootScope**，當此活動加入至工作流程追蹤記錄會僅針對"MyActivity"，而不"Activity1"或"Activity2"發出。For example, if a composite activity is created that is implemented as "MyActivity" with an implementation containing "Activity1" and "Activity2", and **implementationVisibility** is set to **RootScope**, when this activity is added to a workflow tracking records are emitted only for "MyActivity" and not "Activity1" or "Activity2". 如果**implementationVisibility**設為**所有**、"MyActivity"，"Activity1"，然後追蹤記錄和"Activity2"發出。If **implementationVisibility** is set to **All**, then tracking records for "MyActivity", "Activity1", and "Activity2" are emitted.
